node.name: uc - return upper-case version of a string
node.description:
Returns an uppercased version of EXPR. This is the internal function implementing the \U escape in double-quoted strings. Respects current LC_CTYPE locale if use locale in force. See [perlman:perllocale|the perllocale manpage].

If EXPR is omitted, uses $_.
node.title: perlfunc:uc
